verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> [or] Song יָק֣וּם <WH6965> arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> Let God יָפ֣וּצוּ <WH6327> be scattered אוֹיְבָ֑יו <WH341> let his enemies וְיָנ֥וּסוּ <WH5127> him flee מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו <WH8130> let them also that hate מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

כְּהִנְדֹּ֥ף <WH5086> is driven away עָשָׁ֗ן <WH6227> As smoke תִּ֫נְדֹּ֥ף <WH5086> [so] drive [them] away כְּהִמֵּ֣ס <WH4549> melteth דּ֭וֹנַג <WH1749> as wax מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> before אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> the fire יֹאבְד֥וּ <WH6> perish רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> [so] let the wicked מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> at the presence אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְֽצַדִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> But let the righteous יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <WH8055> be glad יַֽ֭עַלְצוּ <WH5970> let them rejoice לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God וְיָשִׂ֥ישׂוּ <WH7797> rejoice בְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> yea let them exceedingly

שִׁ֤ירוּ ׀ <WH7891> Sing לֵֽאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> unto God זַמְּר֪וּ <WH2167> sing praises שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <WH8034> to his name סֹ֡לּוּ <WH5549> extol לָרֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> him that rideth בָּ֭עֲרָבוֹת <WH6160> upon the heavens בְּיָ֥הּ <WH3050> JAH שְׁמ֗וֹ <WH8034> by his name וְעִלְז֥וּ <WH5937> and rejoice לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

אֲבִ֣י <WH1> A father יְ֭תוֹמִים <WH3490> of the fatherless וְדַיַּ֣ן <WH1781> and a judge אַלְמָנ֑וֹת <WH490> of the widows אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> [is] God בִּמְע֥וֹן <WH4583> habitation קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> in his holy

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> God מ֘וֹשִׁ֤יב <WH3427> setteth יְחִידִ֨ים ׀ <WH3173> the solitary בַּ֗יְתָה <WH1004> in families מוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> he bringeth out אֲ֭סִירִים <WH615> those which are bound בַּכּוֹשָׁר֑וֹת <WH3574> with chains אַ֥ךְ <WH389> Only ס֝וֹרֲרִ֗ים <WH5637> but the rebellious שָׁכְנ֥וּ <WH7931> dwell צְחִיחָֽה׃ <WH6707> in a dry

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God בְּ֭צֵאתְךָ <WH3318> when thou wentest forth לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> thy people בְּצַעְדְּךָ֖ <WH6805> when thou didst march בִֽישִׁימ֣וֹן <WH3452> through the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> The earth רָעָ֨שָׁה ׀ <WH7493> shook אַף־ <WH637> also שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> the heavens נָטְפוּ֮ <WH5197> also dropped מִפְּנֵ֪י <WH6440> at the presence אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> of God זֶ֥ה <WH2088> itself סִינַ֑י <WH5514> [even] Sinai מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> [was moved] at the presence אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

גֶּ֣שֶׁם <WH1653> rain נְ֭דָבוֹת <WH5071> a plentiful תָּנִ֣יף <WH5130> didst send אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> Thou O God נַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <WH5159> thine inheritance וְ֝נִלְאָ֗ה <WH3811> when it was weary אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You כֽוֹנַנְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3559> whereby thou didst confirm

חַיָּתְךָ֥ <WH2416> Thy congregation יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> hath dwelt בָ֑הּ תָּ֤כִ֥ין <WH3559> hast prepared בְּטוֹבָתְךָ֖ <WH2896> of thy goodness לֶעָנִ֣י <WH6041> for the poor אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> therein thou O God
אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> The Lord יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> gave אֹ֑מֶר <WH562> the word הַֽ֝מְבַשְּׂר֗וֹת <WH1319> of those that published צָבָ֥א <WH6635> [was] the company רָֽב׃ <WH7227> great

מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> Kings צְ֭בָאוֹת <WH6635> of armies יִדֹּד֣וּן <WH5074> did flee יִדֹּד֑וּן <WH5074> apace וּנְוַת <WH5116> and she that tarried בַּ֝֗יִת <WH1004> at home תְּחַלֵּ֥ק <WH2505> divided שָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> the spoil

אִֽם־ <WH518> When תִּשְׁכְּבוּן֮ <WH7901> Though ye have lien בֵּ֪ין <WH996> among שְׁפַ֫תָּ֥יִם <WH8240> among the pots כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> [yet shall ye be as] the wings י֭וֹנָה <WH3123> of a dove נֶחְפָּ֣ה <WH2645> covered בַכֶּ֑סֶף <WH3701> with silver וְ֝אֶבְרוֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH3422> with yellow בִּֽירַקְרַ֥ק <WH84> and her feathers חָרֽוּץ׃ <WH2742> gold
בְּפָ֘רֵ֤שׂ <WH6566> scattered שַׁדַּ֓י <WH7706> When the Almighty מְלָ֘כִ֤ים <WH4428> kings בָּ֗הּ תַּשְׁלֵ֥ג <WH7949> in it it was [white] as snow בְּצַלְמֽוֹן׃ <WH6756> in Salmon

הַר־ <WH2022> The hill אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> of God הַר־ <WH2022> [is as] the hill בָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> of Bashan הַ֥ר <WH2022> hill גַּ֝בְנֻנִּ֗ים <WH1386> an high הַר־ <WH2022> [as] the hill בָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> of Bashan

לָ֤מָּה ׀ <WH4100> Why תְּֽרַצְּדוּן֮ <WH7520> Why leap הָרִ֪ים <WH2022> mountains גַּבְנֻ֫נִּ֥ים <WH1386> ye ye high הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> the mountain חָמַ֣ד <WH2530> desireth אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> [which] God לְשִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <WH3427> to dwell in אַף־ <WH637> yet יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> yea the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> will dwell לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> [in it] for ever

רֶ֤כֶב <WH7393> The chariots אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God רִבֹּתַ֣יִם <WH7239> [are] twenty thousand אַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> [even] thousands שִׁנְאָ֑ן <WH8136> of angels אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord בָ֝֗ם סִינַ֥י <WH5514> [is] among them [as in] Sinai בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> in the holy

עָ֘לִ֤יתָ <WH5927> Thou hast ascended לַמָּר֨וֹם ׀ <WH4791> on high שָׁ֘בִ֤יתָ <WH7617> captive שֶּׁ֗בִי <WH7628> thou hast led captivity לָקַ֣חְתָּ <WH3947> thou hast received מַ֭תָּנוֹת <WH4979> gifts בָּאָדָ֑ם <WH120> for men וְאַ֥ף <WH637> also ס֝וֹרְרִ֗ים <WH5637> yea [for] the rebellious לִשְׁכֹּ֤ן ׀ <WH7931> might dwell יָ֬הּ <WH3050> also that the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

בָּ֤ר֣וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> [be] the Lord י֤וֹם ׀ <WH3117> daily י֥וֹם <WH3117> daily יַֽעֲמָס־ <WH6006> loadeth לָ֗נוּ הָ֘אֵ֤ל <WH410> us [with benefits even] the God יְֽשׁוּעָתֵ֬נוּ <WH3444> of our salvation סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

הָ֤אֵ֣ל ׀ <WH410> [He that is] our God לָנוּ֮ אֵ֤ל <WH410> [is] the God לְֽמוֹשָׁ֫ע֥וֹת <WH4190> of salvation וְלֵיהוִ֥ה <WH3069> and unto GOD אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> the Lord לַ֝מָּ֗וֶת <WH4194> from death תּוֹצָאֽוֹת׃ <WH8444> [belong] the issues

אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> But God יִמְחַץ֮ <WH4272> shall wound רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> the head אֹ֫יְבָ֥יו <WH341> of his enemies קָדְקֹ֥ד <WH6936> scalp שֵׂעָ֑ר <WH8181> [and] the hairy מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> of such an one as goeth on still בַּאֲשָׁמָֽיו׃ <WH817> in his trespasses

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> The Lord מִבָּשָׁ֣ן <WH1316> from Bashan אָשִׁ֑יב <WH7725> I will bring again אָ֝שִׁ֗יב <WH7725> I will bring [my people] again מִֽמְּצֻל֥וֹת <WH4688> from the depths יָֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

לְמַ֤עַן ׀ <WH4616> because of תִּֽמְחַ֥ץ <WH4272> may be dipped רַגְלְךָ֗ <WH7272> That thy foot בְּ֫דָ֥ם <WH1818> in the blood לְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> [and] the tongue כְּלָבֶ֑יךָ <WH3611> of thy dogs מֵאֹיְבִ֥ים <WH341> of [thine] enemies מִנֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH4480> They

רָא֣וּ <WH7200> They have seen הֲלִיכוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH1979> thy goings אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God הֲלִ֘יכ֤וֹת <WH1979> [even] the goings אֵלִ֖י <WH410> of my God מַלְכִּ֣י <WH4428> my King בַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> in the sanctuary

קִדְּמ֣וּ <WH6923> went before שָׁ֭רִים <WH7891> The singers אַחַ֣ר <WH310> [followed] after נֹגְנִ֑ים <WH5059> the players on instruments בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among עֲ֝לָמ֗וֹת <WH5959> [them were] the damsels תּוֹפֵפֽוֹת׃ <WH8608> playing with timbrels
בְּֽ֭מַקְהֵלוֹת <WH4721> in the congregations בָּרְכ֣וּ <WH1288> Bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ye God יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD מִמְּק֥וֹר <WH4726> from the fountain יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> There בִּנְיָמִ֨ן ׀ <WH1144> Benjamin צָעִ֡יר <WH6810> There [is] little רֹדֵ֗ם <WH7287> [with] their ruler שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the princes יְ֭הוּדָה <WH3063> of Judah רִגְמָתָ֑ם <WH7277> [and] their council שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> the princes זְ֝בֻל֗וּן <WH2074> of Zebulun שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> [and] the princes נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <WH5321> of Naphtali

צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> hath commanded אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> Thy God עֻ֫זֶּ֥ךָ <WH5797> thy strength עוּזָּ֥ה <WH5810> strengthen אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God ז֝֗וּ <WH2098> that which פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <WH6466> thou hast wrought לָּֽנוּ׃
מֵֽ֭הֵיכָלֶךָ <WH1964> Because of thy temple עַל־ <WH5921> at יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem לְךָ֤ יוֹבִ֖ילוּ <WH2986> bring מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> shall kings שָֽׁי׃ <WH7862> presents

גְּעַ֨ר <WH1605> Rebuke חַיַּ֪ת <WH2416> the company קָנֶ֡ה <WH7070> of spearmen עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> the multitude אַבִּירִ֨ים ׀ <WH47> of the bulls בְּעֶגְלֵ֬י <WH5695> with the calves עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> of the people מִתְרַפֵּ֥ס <WH7511> [till every one] submit בְּרַצֵּי־ <WH7518> himself with pieces כָ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver בִּזַּ֥ר <WH967> scatter עַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH5971> thou the people קְרָב֥וֹת <WH7128> in war יֶחְפָּֽצוּ׃ <WH2654> [that] delight

יֶאֱתָ֣יוּ <WH857> shall come out חַ֭שְׁמַנִּים <WH2831> Princes מִנִּ֣י <WH4480> out מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> Ethiopia תָּרִ֥יץ <WH7323> shall soon stretch out יָ֝דָ֗יו <WH3027> her hands לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> unto God

מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> ye kingdoms הָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> of the earth שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> unto God זַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> O sing praises אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> unto the Lord סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

לָ֭רֹכֵב <WH7392> To him that rideth בִּשְׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> upon the heavens שְׁמֵי־ <WH8064> of heavens קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> [which were] of old הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> lo he doth send out בְּ֝קוֹלוֹ <WH6963> his voice ק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> [and that] a mighty

תְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> Ascribe עֹ֗ז <WH5797> ye strength לֵֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> unto God עַֽל־ <WH5921> is over יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> [is] over Israel גַּאֲוָת֑וֹ <WH1346> his excellency וְ֝עֻזּ֗וֹ <WH5797> and his strength בַּשְּׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> [is] in the clouds

נ֤וֹרָ֥א <WH3372> [thou art] terrible אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God מִֽמִּקְדָּ֫שֶׁ֥יךָ <WH4720> out of thy holy places אֵ֤ל <WH410> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel ה֤וּא <WH1931> Himself נֹתֵ֨ן ׀ <WH5414> [is] he that giveth עֹ֖ז <WH5797> strength וְתַעֲצֻמ֥וֹת <WH8592> and power לָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto [his] people בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> [be] God
